decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be completed within six months from the date of this permission, otherwise this permission will lapse.

Reason: In the interests of the character and visual appearance of the property and surrounding area, in accordance with policies 7.4 and 7B of the Development Management Plan (2013), and policies D4 and D6 of The London Plan (2021). | The development hereby approved shall be retained in accordance with drawing title(s):
PRE-Existing - Floor Plans, Drawing No. 01, dated 26 June 2020
PRE-Existing - Plans, Drawing No. 03, dated 26 June 2020
Existing Floor Plan, Sheet No. E001, Rev. B, dated 29 July 2024
Existing Floor Plans, Sheet No. E002, Rev. B, dated 29 July 2024
Existing Elevations, Sheet No. E003, Rev. B, dated 29 July 2024
Existing Section, Sheet No. E004, Rev. B, dated 29 July 2024
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
| T he external render of the extension shall be white as per the email from Excel Planning dated 15 November 2024, the windows and doors of the extension shall be as per the approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
description: Alteration of external render to existing single storey rear extension, alteration of fenestration and doors to remove two rear doors and two side windows and install two rear windows
